pr_title: #4877 fix PathSpec long-standing bugs and shortcomings

timeline.message:
#4877 fix PathSpec long-standing bugs and shortcomings

Signed-off-by: Ludovic Orban <lorban@bitronix.be>

timeline.author: lachlan-roberts

replies.bodyText: @lachlan-roberts because I asked him to make all the fields final. Hard to do the abstract and the final fields without more complication.
replies.author: gregw

replies.bodyText: @gregw Take a look at the file I linked, it doesn't prevent having any final fields in the implementations of the abstract class.
replies.author: lachlan-roberts

replies.bodyText: I like the idea of this abstract class that provides implementations for toString, equals, hashcode and compareTo, especially if I can get rid of the  PathSpec.compareTo default implementation. But I'd make equals and hashcode final then to make sure compareTo and equals always agree. See my comment for context.
replies.author: lorban
